 1994: %% Test enif_get_atom_length
 1995: get_atom_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1996:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 1997:     Char1ByteLatin1 = <<"a">>,
 1998:     Longest1ByteLatin1AtomText = binary:copy(Char1ByteLatin1, 255),
 1999:     Longest1ByteLatin1Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest1ByteLatin1AtomText, latin1),
 2000:     Char2ByteLatin1 = <<"å">>,
 2001:     Longest2ByteLatin1AtomText = binary:copy(Char2ByteLatin1, 255),
 2002:     Longest2ByteLatin1Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest2ByteLatin1AtomText, latin1),
 2003:     Char2ByteUtf8 = <<"å"/utf8>>,
 2004:     Longest2ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char2ByteUtf8, 255),
 2005:     Longest2ByteUtf8Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest2ByteUtf8AtomText, utf8),
 2006:     Char3ByteUtf8 = <<"ᛥ"/utf8>>,
 2007:     Longest3ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char3ByteUtf8, 255),
 2008:     Longest3ByteUtf8Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest3ByteUtf8AtomText, utf8),
 2009:     Char4ByteUtf8 = <<"𠜱"/utf8>>,
 2010:     Longest4ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char4ByteUtf8, 255),
 2011:     Longest4ByteUtf8Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest4ByteUtf8AtomText, utf8),
 2012:     0 = atom_length('', ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2013:     6 = atom_length('hejsan', ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2014:     5 = atom_length('hallå', ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2015:     false = atom_length('Ω', ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2016:     false = atom_length('hejsanΩ', ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2017:     255 = atom_length(Longest1ByteLatin1Atom, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2018:     255 = atom_length(Longest2ByteLatin1Atom, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2019:     255 = atom_length(Longest2ByteUtf8Atom, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2020:     false = atom_length(Longest3ByteUtf8Atom, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2021:     false = atom_length(Longest4ByteUtf8Atom, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2022:     0 = atom_length('', ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2023:     6 = atom_length('hejsan', ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2024:     6 = atom_length('hallå', ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2025:     2 = atom_length('Ω', ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2026:     8 = atom_length('hejsanΩ', ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2027:     255 = atom_length(Longest1ByteLatin1Atom, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2028:     510 = atom_length(Longest2ByteLatin1Atom, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2029:     510 = atom_length(Longest2ByteUtf8Atom, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2030:     765 = atom_length(Longest3ByteUtf8Atom, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2031:     1020 = atom_length(Longest4ByteUtf8Atom, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2032:     ok.

 2034: %% Test enif_make_new_atom_len
 2035: make_new_atoms(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2036:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2037:     Char1ByteAscii = <<"a">>,
 2038:     Longest1ByteAsciiAtomText = binary:copy(Char1ByteAscii, 255),
 2039:     TooLong1ByteAsciiAtomText = binary:copy(Char1ByteAscii, 256),
 2040:     Longest1ByteLatin1Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest1ByteAsciiAtomText, latin1),
 2041:     Char2ByteLatin1 = <<"å">>,
 2042:     Longest2ByteLatin1AtomText = binary:copy(Char2ByteLatin1, 255),
 2043:     TooLong2ByteLatin1AtomText = binary:copy(Char2ByteLatin1, 256),
 2044:     Longest2ByteLatin1Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest2ByteLatin1AtomText, latin1),
 2045:     Char2ByteUtf8 = <<"å"/utf8>>,
 2046:     Longest2ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char2ByteUtf8, 255),
 2047:     TooLong2ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char2ByteUtf8, 256),
 2048:     Longest2ByteUtf8Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest2ByteUtf8AtomText, utf8),
 2049:     Char3ByteUtf8 = <<"ᛥ"/utf8>>,
 2050:     Longest3ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char3ByteUtf8, 255),
 2051:     TooLong3ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char3ByteUtf8, 256),
 2052:     Longest3ByteUtf8Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest3ByteUtf8AtomText, utf8),
 2053:     Char4ByteUtf8 = <<"𠜱"/utf8>>,
 2054:     Longest4ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char4ByteUtf8, 255),
 2055:     TooLong4ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char4ByteUtf8, 256),
 2056:     Longest4ByteUtf8Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest4ByteUtf8AtomText, utf8),
 2057:     hejsan = make_new_atom(<<"hejsan">>, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2058:     'hallå' = make_new_atom(<<"hallå">>, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2059:     'Î©' = make_new_atom(<<"Ω"/utf8>>, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2060:     '' = make_new_atom(<<>>, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2061:     Longest1ByteAsciiAtom = make_new_atom(Longest1ByteAsciiAtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2062:     0 = make_new_atom(TooLong1ByteAsciiAtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2063:     Longest2ByteLatin1Atom = make_new_atom(Longest2ByteLatin1AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2064:     0 = make_new_atom(TooLong2ByteLatin1AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2065:     0 = make_new_atom(Longest2ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2066:     0 = make_new_atom(TooLong2ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2067:     0 = make_new_atom(Longest3ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2068:     0 = make_new_atom(TooLong3ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2069:     0 = make_new_atom(Longest4ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2070:     0 = make_new_atom(TooLong4ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2071:     hejsan = make_new_atom(<<"hejsan"/utf8>>, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2072:     'hallå' = make_new_atom(<<"hallå"/utf8>>, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2073:     'Ω' = make_new_atom(<<"Ω"/utf8>>, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2074:     '' = make_new_atom(<<>>, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2075:     Longest1ByteAsciiAtom = make_new_atom(Longest1ByteAsciiAtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2076:     0 = make_new_atom(TooLong1ByteAsciiAtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2077:     0 = make_new_atom(Longest2ByteLatin1AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2078:     0 = make_new_atom(TooLong2ByteLatin1AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2079:     Longest2ByteUtf8Atom = make_new_atom(Longest2ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2080:     0 = make_new_atom(TooLong2ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2081:     Longest3ByteUtf8Atom = make_new_atom(Longest3ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2082:     0 = make_new_atom(TooLong3ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2083:     Longest4ByteUtf8Atom = make_new_atom(Longest4ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2084:     0 = make_new_atom(TooLong4ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2085:     ok.

 2087: %% Test enif_make_existing_atom_len
 2088: make_existing_atoms(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2089:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2090:     _Existing = [hejsan, 'hallå', 'Î©', 'Ω', ''],
 2091:     Char1ByteLatin1 = <<"a">>,
 2092:     Char1ByteLatin1NE = <<"u">>,
 2093:     Longest1ByteLatin1AtomText = binary:copy(Char1ByteLatin1, 255),
 2094:     Longest1ByteLatin1AtomTextNE = binary:copy(Char1ByteLatin1NE, 255),
 2095:     TooLong1ByteLatin1AtomText = binary:copy(Char1ByteLatin1, 256),
 2096:     Longest1ByteLatin1Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest1ByteLatin1AtomText, latin1),
 2097:     Char2ByteLatin1 = <<"å">>,
 2098:     Char2ByteLatin1NE = <<"ú">>,
 2099:     Longest2ByteLatin1AtomText = binary:copy(Char2ByteLatin1, 255),
 2100:     Longest2ByteLatin1AtomTextNE = binary:copy(Char2ByteLatin1NE, 255),
 2101:     TooLong2ByteLatin1AtomText = binary:copy(Char2ByteLatin1, 256),
 2102:     Longest2ByteLatin1Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest2ByteLatin1AtomText, latin1),
 2103:     Char2ByteUtf8 = <<"å"/utf8>>,
 2104:     Char2ByteUtf8NE = <<"ú"/utf8>>,
 2105:     Longest2ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char2ByteUtf8, 255),
 2106:     Longest2ByteUtf8AtomTextNE = binary:copy(Char2ByteUtf8NE, 255),
 2107:     TooLong2ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char2ByteUtf8, 256),
 2108:     Longest2ByteUtf8Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest2ByteUtf8AtomText, utf8),
 2109:     Char3ByteUtf8 = <<"ᛥ"/utf8>>,
 2110:     Char3ByteUtf8NE = <<"ᛤ"/utf8>>,
 2111:     Longest3ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char3ByteUtf8, 255),
 2112:     Longest3ByteUtf8AtomTextNE = binary:copy(Char3ByteUtf8NE, 255),
 2113:     TooLong3ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char3ByteUtf8, 256),
 2114:     Longest3ByteUtf8Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest3ByteUtf8AtomText, utf8),
 2115:     Char4ByteUtf8 = <<"𠜱"/utf8>>,
 2116:     Char4ByteUtf8NE = <<"𠴕"/utf8>>,
 2117:     Longest4ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char4ByteUtf8, 255),
 2118:     Longest4ByteUtf8AtomTextNE = binary:copy(Char4ByteUtf8NE, 255),
 2119:     TooLong4ByteUtf8AtomText = binary:copy(Char4ByteUtf8, 256),
 2120:     Longest4ByteUtf8Atom = erlang:binary_to_atom(Longest4ByteUtf8AtomText, utf8),
 2121:     hejsan = make_existing_atom(<<"hejsan">>, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2122:     'hallå' = make_existing_atom(<<"hallå">>, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2123:     'Î©' = make_existing_atom(<<"Ω"/utf8>>, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2124:     '' = make_existing_atom(<<>>, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2125:     0 = make_existing_atom(<<"hejsan1234">>, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2126:     0 = make_existing_atom(<<"hallå1234">>, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2127:     0 = make_existing_atom(<<"Ω1234"/utf8>>, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2128:     Longest1ByteLatin1Atom = make_existing_atom(Longest1ByteLatin1AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2129:     0 = make_existing_atom(Longest1ByteLatin1AtomTextNE, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2130:     0 = make_existing_atom(TooLong1ByteLatin1AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2131:     Longest2ByteLatin1Atom = make_existing_atom(Longest2ByteLatin1AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2132:     0 = make_existing_atom(Longest2ByteLatin1AtomTextNE, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2133:     0 = make_existing_atom(TooLong2ByteLatin1AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2134:     0 = make_existing_atom(Longest2ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2135:     0 = make_existing_atom(Longest2ByteUtf8AtomTextNE, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2136:     0 = make_existing_atom(TooLong2ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2137:     0 = make_existing_atom(Longest3ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2138:     0 = make_existing_atom(Longest3ByteUtf8AtomTextNE, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2139:     0 = make_existing_atom(TooLong3ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2140:     0 = make_existing_atom(Longest4ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2141:     0 = make_existing_atom(Longest4ByteUtf8AtomTextNE, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2142:     0 = make_existing_atom(TooLong4ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_LATIN1),
 2143:     hejsan = make_existing_atom(<<"hejsan"/utf8>>, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2144:     'hallå' = make_existing_atom(<<"hallå"/utf8>>, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2145:     'Ω' = make_existing_atom(<<"Ω"/utf8>>, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2146:     '' = make_existing_atom(<<>>, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2147:     0 = make_existing_atom(<<"hejsan1234"/utf8>>, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2148:     0 = make_existing_atom(<<"hallå1234"/utf8>>, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2149:     0 = make_existing_atom(<<"Ω1234"/utf8>>, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2150:     Longest1ByteLatin1Atom = make_existing_atom(Longest1ByteLatin1AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2151:     0 = make_existing_atom(Longest1ByteLatin1AtomTextNE, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2152:     0 = make_existing_atom(TooLong1ByteLatin1AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2153:     0 = make_existing_atom(Longest2ByteLatin1AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2154:     0 = make_existing_atom(Longest2ByteLatin1AtomTextNE, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2155:     0 = make_existing_atom(TooLong2ByteLatin1AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2156:     Longest2ByteUtf8Atom = make_existing_atom(Longest2ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2157:     0 = make_existing_atom(Longest2ByteUtf8AtomTextNE, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2158:     0 = make_existing_atom(TooLong2ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2159:     Longest3ByteUtf8Atom = make_existing_atom(Longest3ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2160:     0 = make_existing_atom(Longest3ByteUtf8AtomTextNE, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2161:     0 = make_existing_atom(TooLong3ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2162:     Longest4ByteUtf8Atom = make_existing_atom(Longest4ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2163:     0 = make_existing_atom(Longest4ByteUtf8AtomTextNE, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2164:     0 = make_existing_atom(TooLong4ByteUtf8AtomText, ?ERL_NIF_UTF8),
 2165:     ok.
 2166: 
 2167: %% Test NIF maps handling.
 2168: maps(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2169:     TmpMem = tmpmem(),
 2170:     Pairs = [{adam, "bert"}] ++
 2171:             [{I,I}||I <- lists:seq(1,10)] ++
 2172: 	    [{a,value},{"a","value"},{<<"a">>,<<"value">>}],
 2173:     ok = ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2174:     M  = maps_from_list_nif(Pairs),
 2175:     R = {RIs,Is} = sorted_list_from_maps_nif(M),
 2176:     io:format("Pairs: ~p~nMap: ~p~nReturned: ~p~n", [lists:sort(Pairs),M,R]),
 2177:     true = (lists:sort(Is) =:= lists:sort(Pairs)),
 2178:     Is = lists:reverse(RIs),
 2179: 
 2180:     #{} = maps_from_list_nif([]),
 2181:     {[],[]} = sorted_list_from_maps_nif(#{}),
 2182: 
 2183:     1 = is_map_nif(M),
 2184:     0 = is_map_nif("no map"),
 2185: 
 2186:     Msz = map_size(M),
 2187:     {1,Msz} = get_map_size_nif(M),
 2188:     {1,0} = get_map_size_nif(#{}),
 2189:     {0,-123} = get_map_size_nif({#{}}),
 2190: 
 2191:     #{} = M0 = make_new_map_nif(),
 2192: 
 2193:     {1, #{key := value}=M1} = make_map_put_nif(M0, key, value),
 2194:     {1, #{key := value, "key2" := "value2"}=M2} = make_map_put_nif(M1, "key2", "value2"),
 2195:     {1, #{key := "value", "key2" := "value2"}=M3} = make_map_put_nif(M2, key, "value"),
 2196:     {0, undefined} = make_map_put_nif(666, key, value),
 2197: 
 2198:     {1, "value2"} = get_map_value_nif(M3,"key2"),
 2199:     {0, undefined} = get_map_value_nif(M3,"key3"),
 2200:     {0, undefined} = get_map_value_nif(false,key),
 2201: 
 2202:     {0, undefined} = make_map_update_nif(M0, key, value),
 2203:     {0, undefined} = make_map_update_nif(M1, "key2", "value2"),
 2204:     {1, #{key := "value", "key2" := "value2"}} = make_map_update_nif(M2, key, "value"),
 2205:     {0, undefined} = make_map_update_nif(666, key, value),
 2206: 
 2207:     {1, #{}} = make_map_remove_nif(M1, key),
 2208:     {1, M1} = make_map_remove_nif(M2, "key2"),
 2209:     {1, M2} = make_map_remove_nif(M2, "key3"),
 2210:     {0, undefined} = make_map_remove_nif(self(), key),
 2211: 
 2212:     M1 = maps_from_list_nif(maps:to_list(M1)),
 2213:     M2 = maps_from_list_nif(maps:to_list(M2)),
 2214:     M3 = maps_from_list_nif(maps:to_list(M3)),
 2215: 
 2216:     %% Test different map sizes (OTP-15567)
 2217:     repeat_while(fun({35,_}) -> false;
 2218:                     ({K,Map}) ->
 2219:                          Map = maps_from_list_nif(maps:to_list(Map)),
 2220:                          Map = maps:filter(fun(K2,V) -> V =:= K2*100 end, Map),
 2221:                          {K+1, maps:put(K,K*100,Map)}
 2222:                  end,
 2223:                  {1,#{}}),
 2224: 
 2225:     M5 = lists:foldl(fun(N, MapIn) ->
 2226:                              {1, #{N := value}=MapOut} = make_map_put_nif(MapIn, N, value),
 2227:                              MapOut
 2228:                      end,
 2229:                      #{},
 2230:                      lists:seq(1,40)),
 2231:     M6 = lists:foldl(fun(N, MapIn) ->
 2232:                              {1, MapOut} = make_map_remove_nif(MapIn, N),
 2233:                              ok = maps:get(N, MapOut, ok),
 2234:                              MapOut
 2235:                      end,
 2236:                      M5,
 2237:                      lists:seq(1,40)),
 2238:     true = (M6 =:= #{}),
 2239: 
 2240:     has_duplicate_keys = maps_from_list_nif([{1,1},{1,1}]),
 2241: 
 2242:     verify_tmpmem(TmpMem),
 2243:     ok.
 2244:  
 2245: %% Test macros enif_make_list<N> and enif_make_tuple<N>
 2246: api_macros(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2247:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2248:     Expected = {[lists:seq(1,N) || N <- lists:seq(1,9)],
 2249: 		[list_to_tuple(lists:seq(1,N)) || N <- lists:seq(1,9)]
 2250: 	       },
 2251:     Expected = macros(list_to_tuple(lists:seq(1,9))),
 2252:     ok.
 2253: 
 2254: %% enif_make_[tuple|list]_from_array
 2255: from_array(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2256:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2257:     lists:foreach(fun(Tpl) ->
 2258: 			  Lst = tuple_to_list(Tpl),
 2259: 			  {Lst,Tpl} = tuple_2_list_and_tuple(Tpl)
 2260: 		  end,
 2261: 		  [{}, {1,2,3}, {[4,5],[],{},{6,7}}, {{}}, {[]}]),
 2262:     ok.
 2263: 
 2264: %% enif_inspect_iolist_as_binary
 2265: iolist_as_binary(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2266:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2267:     TmpMem = tmpmem(),
 2268:     List = [<<"hejsan">>, <<>>, [], [17], [<<>>],
 2269: 	    [127,128,255,0],
 2270: 	    [1, 2, 3, <<"abc">>, [<<"def">>,4], 5, <<"ghi">>],
 2271: 	    [1, 2, 3, <<"abc">>, [<<"def">>,4], 5 | <<"ghi">>]],
 2272: 	    
 2273:     lists:foreach(fun(IoL) ->
 2274: 			  B1 = erlang:iolist_to_binary(IoL),
 2275: 			  B2 = iolist_2_bin(IoL),
 2276: 			  B1 = B2
 2277: 		  end,
 2278: 		  List),
 2279:     verify_tmpmem(TmpMem),
 2280:     ok.
 2281: 
 2282: %% Test memory managed objects, aka 'resources'
 2283: resource(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2284:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2285:     Type = get_resource_type(0),
 2286:     resource_hugo(Type),
 2287:     resource_otto(Type),
 2288:     resource_new(Type),
 2289:     resource_neg(Type),
 2290:     ok.
 2291: 
 2292: resource_hugo(Type) ->
 2293:     DtorCall = resource_hugo_do(Type),
 2294:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2295:     DtorCall = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2296:     ok.
 2297: 
 2298: resource_hugo_do(Type) ->
 2299:     HugoBin = <<"Hugo Hacker">>,
 2300:     HugoPtr = alloc_resource(Type, HugoBin),
 2301:     Hugo = make_resource(HugoPtr),
 2302:     true = is_reference(Hugo),
 2303:     release_resource(HugoPtr),
 2304:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2305:     {HugoPtr,HugoBin} = get_resource(Type,Hugo),
 2306:     {Pid,_} =
 2307:         spawn_monitor(fun() ->
 2308:                               receive {Pid, Type, Resource, Ptr, Bin} ->
 2309:                                       Pid ! {self(), got_it},
 2310:                                       receive {Pid, check_it} ->
 2311:                                               {Ptr,Bin} = get_resource(Type,Resource)
 2312:                                       end
 2313:                               end,
 2314:                               gc_and_exit(ok)
 2315:                       end),
 2316:     Pid ! {self(), Type, Hugo, HugoPtr, HugoBin},
 2317:     {Pid, got_it} = receive_any(),
 2318:     erlang:garbage_collect(),   % just to make our ProcBin move in memory
 2319:     Pid ! {self(), check_it},
 2320:     {'DOWN', _, process, Pid, ok} = receive_any(),
 2321:     [] = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2322:     {HugoPtr,HugoBin} = get_resource(Type,Hugo),
 2323:     {HugoPtr, HugoBin, 1}.
 2324: 
 2325: gc_and_exit(Reason) ->
 2326:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2327:     exit(Reason).
 2328: 
 2329: resource_otto(Type) ->
 2330:     {OttoPtr, OttoBin} = resource_otto_do(Type),
 2331:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2332:     [] = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2333:     release_resource(OttoPtr),
 2334:     {OttoPtr,OttoBin,1} = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2335:     ok.
 2336:     
 2337: resource_otto_do(Type) ->
 2338:     OttoBin = <<"Otto Ordonnans">>,
 2339:     OttoPtr = alloc_resource(Type, OttoBin),
 2340:     Otto = make_resource(OttoPtr),
 2341:     true = is_reference(Otto),
 2342:     %% forget resource term but keep referenced by NIF
 2343:     {OttoPtr, OttoBin}.    
 2344: 
 2345: resource_new(Type) ->
 2346:     {PtrB,BinB} = resource_new_do1(Type),
 2347:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2348:     {PtrB,BinB,1} = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2349:     ok.
 2350:     
 2351: resource_new_do1(Type) ->
 2352:     {{PtrA,BinA}, {ResB,PtrB,BinB}} = resource_new_do2(Type),
 2353:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2354:     {PtrA,BinA,1} = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2355:     {PtrB,BinB} = get_resource(Type, ResB),
 2356:     %% forget ResB and make it garbage
 2357:     {PtrB,BinB}.
 2358:     
 2359: resource_new_do2(Type) ->
 2360:     BinA = <<"NewA">>,
 2361:     BinB = <<"NewB">>,
 2362:     ResA = make_new_resource(Type, BinA),
 2363:     ResB = make_new_resource(Type, BinB),
 2364:     true = is_reference(ResA),
 2365:     true = is_reference(ResB),
 2366:     true = (ResA /= ResB),
 2367:     {PtrA,BinA} = get_resource(Type, ResA),
 2368:     {PtrB,BinB} = get_resource(Type, ResB),
 2369:     true = (PtrA =/= PtrB),
 2370:     %% forget ResA and make it garbage
 2371:     {{PtrA,BinA}, {ResB,PtrB,BinB}}.
 2372: 
 2373: resource_neg(TypeA) ->
 2374:     resource_neg_do(TypeA),
 2375: 
 2376:     catch exit(42), % dummy exception to purge saved stacktraces from earlier exception
 2377:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2378:     {_,_,2} = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2379:     ok.
 2380: 
 2381: resource_neg_do(TypeA) ->
 2382:     TypeB = get_resource_type(1),
 2383:     ResA = make_new_resource(TypeA, <<"Arnold">>),
 2384:     ResB= make_new_resource(TypeB, <<"Bobo">>),
 2385:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch get_resource(TypeA, ResB)),
 2386:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch get_resource(TypeB, ResA)),
 2387: 
 2388:     %% Test init_resource_type fail outside load/upgrade
 2389:     {0, ?RT_CREATE} = init_resource_type("in_vain", ?RT_CREATE),
 2390:     {0, ?RT_TAKEOVER} = init_resource_type("Gold", ?RT_TAKEOVER),
 2391:     {0, ?RT_CREATE bor ?RT_TAKEOVER} =
 2392:         init_resource_type("Gold", ?RT_CREATE bor ?RT_TAKEOVER),
 2393:     ok.
 2394: 
 2395: %% Test enif_make_resource_binary
 2396: resource_binary(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2397:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2398:     {Ptr,Bin} = resource_binary_do(),
 2399:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2400:     Last = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2401:     ?CHECK({Ptr,Bin,1}, Last),
 2402:     ok.
 2403: 
 2404: resource_binary_do() ->
 2405:     Bin = <<"Hej Hopp i lingonskogen">>,
 2406:     {Ptr,ResBin1} = make_new_resource_binary(Bin),
 2407:     ResBin1 = Bin,          
 2408:     ResInfo = {Ptr,_} = get_resource(binary_resource_type,ResBin1),
 2409: 
 2410:     Papa = self(),
 2411:     {Forwarder,_} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> forwarder(Papa) end),
 2412:     io:format("sending to forwarder pid=~p\n",[Forwarder]),  
 2413:     Forwarder ! ResBin1,
 2414:     ResBin2 = receive_any(),
 2415:     ResBin2 = ResBin1,
 2416:     ResInfo = get_resource(binary_resource_type,ResBin2),
 2417:     Forwarder ! terminate,
 2418:     {'DOWN', _, process, Forwarder, 1} = receive_any(),
 2419:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2420:     ResInfo = get_resource(binary_resource_type,ResBin1),
 2421:     ResInfo = get_resource(binary_resource_type,ResBin2),
 2422:     ResInfo.
 2423: 
 2424: %% Test resource takeover by module upgrade
 2425: resource_takeover(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
 2426:     TmpMem = tmpmem(),
 2427:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2428: 
 2429:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2430:     File = filename:join(Data, "nif_mod"),
 2431:     {ok,nif_mod,ModBin} = compile:file(File, [binary,return_errors]),
 2432:     {module,nif_mod} = erlang:load_module(nif_mod,ModBin),
 2433: 
 2434:     ok = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 1, 
 2435:                               [{resource_type, 0, ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_A",resource_dtor_A,
 2436:                                 ?RT_CREATE},
 2437:                                {resource_type, 1, ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_null_A",null,
 2438:                                 ?RT_CREATE},
 2439:                                {resource_type, 2, ?RT_CREATE bor ?RT_TAKEOVER, "resource_type_A_null",resource_dtor_A,
 2440:                                 ?RT_CREATE},
 2441:                                {resource_type, 3, ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_B_goneX",resource_dtor_B,
 2442:                                 ?RT_CREATE},
 2443:                                {resource_type, 4, ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_null_goneX",null,
 2444:                                 ?RT_CREATE},
 2445:                                {resource_type, null, ?RT_TAKEOVER, "Pink unicorn", resource_dtor_A,
 2446:                                 ?RT_TAKEOVER}
 2447:                               ]),
 2448: 
 2449:     hold_nif_mod_priv_data(nif_mod:get_priv_data_ptr()),
 2450:     [{load,1,1,101},{get_priv_data_ptr,1,2,102}] = nif_mod_call_history(),
 2451: 
 2452:     {Holder, _MRef} = spawn_opt(fun resource_holder/0, [link, monitor]),
 2453: 
 2454:     {A1,BinA1} = make_resource(0,Holder,"A1"),
 2455:     {A2,BinA2} = make_resource(0,Holder,"A2"),
 2456:     {A3,BinA3} = make_resource(0,Holder,"A3"),
 2457: 
 2458:     {NA1,_BinNA1} = make_resource(1,Holder,"NA1"),
 2459:     {NA2,BinNA2} = make_resource(1,Holder,"NA2"),
 2460:     {NA3,_BinNA3} = make_resource(1,Holder,"NA3"),
 2461: 
 2462:     {AN1,BinAN1} = make_resource(2,Holder,"AN1"),
 2463:     {AN2,_BinAN2} = make_resource(2,Holder,"AN2"),
 2464:     {AN3,BinAN3} = make_resource(2,Holder,"AN3"),
 2465: 
 2466:     {BGX1,BinBGX1} = make_resource(3,Holder,"BGX1"),
 2467:     {BGX2,BinBGX2} = make_resource(3,Holder,"BGX2"),
 2468: 
 2469:     {NGX1,_BinNGX1} = make_resource(4,Holder,"NGX1"),
 2470:     {NGX2,_BinNGX2} = make_resource(4,Holder,"NGX2"),
 2471: 
 2472:     [] = nif_mod_call_history(),
 2473: 
 2474:     ok = forget_resource(A1),
 2475:     [{{resource_dtor_A_v1,BinA1},1,3,103}] = nif_mod_call_history(),    
 2476: 
 2477:     ok = forget_resource(NA1),
 2478:     [] = nif_mod_call_history(), % no dtor
 2479: 
 2480:     ok = forget_resource(AN1),
 2481:     ?CHECK([{{resource_dtor_A_v1,BinAN1},1,4,104}] , nif_mod_call_history()),
 2482: 
 2483:     ok = forget_resource(BGX1),
 2484:     ?CHECK([{{resource_dtor_B_v1,BinBGX1},1,5,105}], nif_mod_call_history()),
 2485: 
 2486:     ok = forget_resource(NGX1),
 2487:     ?CHECK([], nif_mod_call_history()), % no dtor
 2488: 
 2489:     {module,nif_mod} = erlang:load_module(nif_mod,ModBin),
 2490:     ok = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 2,
 2491:                               [{resource_type, 0, ?RT_TAKEOVER, "resource_type_A",resource_dtor_A,
 2492:                                 ?RT_TAKEOVER},
 2493:                                {resource_type, 1, ?RT_TAKEOVER bor ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_null_A",resource_dtor_A,
 2494:                                 ?RT_TAKEOVER},
 2495:                                {resource_type, 2, ?RT_TAKEOVER, "resource_type_A_null",null,
 2496:                                 ?RT_TAKEOVER},
 2497:                                {resource_type, null, ?RT_TAKEOVER, "Pink unicorn", resource_dtor_A,
 2498:                                 ?RT_TAKEOVER},
 2499:                                {resource_type, null, ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_B_goneX",resource_dtor_B,
 2500:                                 ?RT_CREATE},
 2501:                                {resource_type, null, ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_null_goneX",null,
 2502:                                 ?RT_CREATE},
 2503:                                {resource_type, 3, ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_B_goneY",resource_dtor_B,
 2504:                                 ?RT_CREATE},
 2505:                                {resource_type, 4, ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_null_goneY",null,
 2506:                                 ?RT_CREATE}
 2507:                               ]),
 2508:     ?CHECK([{upgrade,2,1,201}], nif_mod_call_history()),
 2509:     true = erlang:purge_module(nif_mod),
 2510:     timeout = receive unloaded -> error after 10 -> timeout end,
 2511:     ?CHECK([], nif_mod_call_history()),  % BGX2 keeping lib loaded
 2512: 
 2513:     BinA2 = read_resource(0,A2),
 2514:     ok = forget_resource(A2),
 2515:     ?CHECK([{{resource_dtor_A_v2,BinA2},2,2,202}], nif_mod_call_history()),    
 2516: 
 2517:     ok = forget_resource(NA2),
 2518:     ?CHECK([{{resource_dtor_A_v2,BinNA2},2,3,203}], nif_mod_call_history()),    
 2519: 
 2520:     ok = forget_resource(AN2),
 2521:     ?CHECK([], nif_mod_call_history()),    % no dtor
 2522: 
 2523:     ok = forget_resource_unload(BGX2),  % calling dtor in orphan library v1 still loaded
 2524:     ?CHECK([{{resource_dtor_B_v1,BinBGX2},1,6,106}, {unload,1,7,107}],
 2525:            nif_mod_call_history()),
 2526: 
 2527:     ok = forget_resource(NGX2),
 2528:     ?CHECK([], nif_mod_call_history()),  % no dtor
 2529: 
 2530:     {BGY1,BinBGY1} = make_resource(3,Holder,"BGY1"),
 2531:     {NGY1,_BinNGY1} = make_resource(4,Holder,"NGY1"),
 2532: 
 2533:     %% Module upgrade with same lib-version
 2534:     {module,nif_mod} = erlang:load_module(nif_mod,ModBin),
 2535:     undefined = nif_mod:lib_version(),
 2536:     ok = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 2,
 2537:                               [{resource_type, 2, ?RT_TAKEOVER, "resource_type_A",resource_dtor_B,
 2538:                                 ?RT_TAKEOVER},
 2539:                                {resource_type, 0, ?RT_TAKEOVER bor ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_null_A",null,
 2540:                                 ?RT_TAKEOVER},
 2541:                                {resource_type, 1, ?RT_TAKEOVER, "resource_type_A_null",resource_dtor_A,
 2542:                                 ?RT_TAKEOVER},
 2543:                                {resource_type, null, ?RT_TAKEOVER, "Pink elephant", resource_dtor_A,
 2544:                                 ?RT_TAKEOVER},
 2545:                                {resource_type, 3, ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_B_goneZ",resource_dtor_B,
 2546:                                 ?RT_CREATE},
 2547:                                {resource_type, 4, ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_null_goneZ",null,
 2548:                                 ?RT_CREATE}
 2549:                               ]),
 2550: 
 2551:     2 = nif_mod:lib_version(),
 2552:     ?CHECK([{upgrade,2,4,204},{lib_version,2,5,205}], nif_mod_call_history()),
 2553: 
 2554:     ok = forget_resource(A3),
 2555:     ?CHECK([{{resource_dtor_B_v2,BinA3},2,6,206}], nif_mod_call_history()),    
 2556:

 2558:     ?CHECK([], nif_mod_call_history()),    
 2559:

 2756:     true = lists:member(nif_mod, erlang:system_info(taints)),

 2759: 
 2760: make_resource(Type,Holder,Str) when is_list(Str) ->
 2761:     Bin = list_to_binary(Str),
 2762:     A1 = make_resource_do(Type,Holder,Bin),
 2763:     Bin = read_resource(Type,A1),
 2764:     {A1,Bin}.
 2765: 
 2766: make_resource_do(Type, Holder, Bin) ->
 2767:     Holder ! {self(), make, Type, Bin},
 2768:     {Holder, make_ok, Id} = receive_any(),
 2769:     {Holder,Id}.
 2770: 
 2771: read_resource(Type, {Holder,Id}) ->
 2772:     Holder ! {self(), get, Type, Id},
 2773:     {Holder, get_ok, Bin} = receive_any(),
 2774:     Bin.
 2775: 
 2776: forget_resource({Holder,Id}) ->
 2777:     Holder ! {self(), forget, Id},
 2778:     {Holder, forget_ok, Id} = receive_any(),
 2779:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(wait, aux_work),
 2780:     ok.
 2781: 
 2782: forget_resource_unload({Holder,Id}) ->
 2783:     Holder ! {self(), forget, Id},
 2784:     ok = receive_any_order([{Holder, forget_ok, Id},
 2785:                             unloaded]),
 2786:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(wait, aux_work),
 2787:     ok.
 2788: 
 2789: 
 2790: resource_holder() ->
 2791:     resource_holder([]).
 2792: resource_holder(List) ->
 2793:     %%io:format("resource_holder waiting for msg\n", []),
 2794:     Msg = receive_any(),
 2795:     %%io:format("resource_holder got ~p with list = ~p\n", [Msg,List]),
 2796:     case Msg of
 2797: 	{Pid, make, Type, Bin} ->	    
 2798: 	    Resource = nif_mod:make_new_resource(Type, Bin),
 2799: 	    Id = {make_ref(),Bin},
 2800: 	    Pid ! {self(), make_ok, Id},
 2801: 	    resource_holder([{Id,Resource} | List]);
 2802: 	{Pid, get, Type, Id} ->
 2803: 	    {Id,Resource} = lists:keyfind(Id, 1, List),
 2804: 	    Pid ! {self(), get_ok, nif_mod:get_resource(Type, Resource)},
 2805: 	    resource_holder(List);
 2806: 	
 2807: 	{Pid, forget, Id} ->
 2808: 	    NewList = lists:keydelete(Id, 1, List),
 2809: 	    %%io:format("resource_holder forget: NewList = ~p\n", [NewList]),
 2810: 	    resource_holder(Pid, {self(),forget_ok,Id}, NewList)
 2811:     end.
 2812: 
 2813: resource_holder(Pid,Reply,List) ->
 2814:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2815:     %%io:format("resource_holder GC'ed, now send ~p to ~p\n", [Reply,Pid]),
 2816:     Pid ! Reply,
 2817:     resource_holder(List).
 2818: 
 2819: 
 2820: %% Test the threading API functions (reuse tests from driver API)
 2821: threading(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2822:     case erlang:system_info(threads) of
 2823:     	true -> threading_do(Config);
 2824: 	false -> {skipped,"No thread support"}
 2825:     end.
 2826: 
 2827: threading_do(Config) ->
 2828:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2829:     File = filename:join(Data, "tester"),
 2830:     {ok,tester,ModBin} = compile:file(File, [binary,return_errors]),
 2831:     {module,tester} = erlang:load_module(tester,ModBin),
 2832: 
 2833:     ok = tester:load_nif_lib(Config, "basic"),   
 2834:     ok = tester:run(),
 2835: 
 2836:     erlang:load_module(tester,ModBin),
 2837:     erlang:purge_module(tester),
 2838:     ok = tester:load_nif_lib(Config, "rwlock"),
 2839:     ok = tester:run(),
 2840: 
 2841:     erlang:load_module(tester,ModBin),
 2842:     erlang:purge_module(tester),
 2843:     ok = tester:load_nif_lib(Config, "tsd"),
 2844:     ok = tester:run(),
 2845: 
 2846:     erlang:delete_module(tester),
 2847:     erlang:purge_module(tester).
 2848: 
 2849: 
 2850: %% Test NIF message sending
 2851: send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
 2852:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2853: 
 2854:     N = 1500,
 2855:     List = lists:seq(1,N),
 2856:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self),
 2857:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self()),
 2858:     List = receive_any(),
 2859:     List = receive_any(),
 2860:     Papa = self(),
 2861:     spawn_link(fun() -> {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, Papa) end),
 2862:     List = receive_any(),
 2863: 
 2864:     {ok, 1, BlobS} = send_new_blob(self(), other_term()),
 2865:     BlobR = receive_any(),
 2866:     io:format("Sent ~p\nGot ~p\n", [BlobS, BlobR]),
 2867:     BlobR = BlobS,
 2868: 
 2869:     %% send to dead pid
 2870:     {DeadPid, DeadMon} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> void end),
 2871:     {'DOWN', DeadMon, process, DeadPid, normal} = receive_any(),
 2872:     {ok,0} = send_list_seq(7, DeadPid),
 2873:     ok.
 2874: 
 2875: 
 2876: %% Test tracing of enif_send
 2877: send_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2878:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2879: 
 2880:     Papa = self(),
 2881:     N = 1500,
 2882:     List = lists:seq(1,N),
 2883: 
 2884:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun F() -> receive get -> Papa ! receive_any(), F() end end),
 2885: 
 2886:     erlang:trace(self(), true, [send,'receive',{tracer,Tracer}]),
 2887:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self()),
 2888:     List = receive_any(),
 2889:     timeout = receive_any(0),
 2890:     Tracer ! get,
 2891:     {trace,Papa,send,List,Papa} = receive_any(),
 2892:     Tracer ! get,
 2893:     {trace,Papa,'receive',List} = receive_any().
 2894: 
 2895: %% Test that seq_trace works with nif trace
 2896: send_seq_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2897:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2898: 
 2899:     Papa = self(),
 2900:     N = 1500,
 2901:     List = lists:seq(1,N),
 2902:     Label = make_ref(),
 2903: 
 2904:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun F() -> receive get -> Papa ! receive_any(), F() end end),
 2905: 
 2906:     seq_trace:set_system_tracer(Tracer),
 2907:     seq_trace:set_token(label,Label),
 2908:     seq_trace:set_token(send,true),
 2909:     seq_trace:set_token('receive',true),
 2910: 
 2911:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self()),
 2912:     List = receive_any(),
 2913:     timeout = receive_any(0),
 2914:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self()),
 2915:     List = receive_any(),
 2916:     timeout = receive_any(0),
 2917: 
 2918:     Tracer ! get,
 2919:     {seq_trace,Label,{send,{0,1},Papa,Papa,List}} = receive_any(),
 2920:     Tracer ! get,
 2921:     {seq_trace,Label,{'receive',{0,1},Papa,Papa,List}} = receive_any(),
 2922:     Tracer ! get,
 2923:     {seq_trace,Label,{send,{1,2},Papa,Papa,List}} = receive_any(),
 2924:     Tracer ! get,
 2925:     {seq_trace,Label,{'receive',{1,2},Papa,Papa,List}} = receive_any().
 2926: 
 2927: 
 2928: %% More NIF message sending
 2929: send2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2930:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2931: 
 2932:     send2_do1(fun send_blob_dbg/2),
 2933:     ok.
 2934: 
 2935: %% Send msg from user thread
 2936: send_threaded(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2937:     send2_do1(fun(ME,To) -> send_blob_thread_dbg(ME,To,join) end),
 2938:     send2_do1(fun(ME,To) -> send_blob_thread_and_join(ME,To) end),
 2939:     ok.
 2940: 
 2941: 
 2942: send2_do1(SendBlobF) ->
 2943:     io:format("sending to self=~p\n",[self()]),
 2944:     send2_do2(SendBlobF, self()),
 2945: 
 2946:     Papa = self(),
 2947:     {Forwarder,_} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> forwarder(Papa) end),
 2948:     io:format("sending to forwarder pid=~p\n",[Forwarder]),
 2949:     send2_do2(SendBlobF, Forwarder),
 2950:     Forwarder ! terminate,
 2951:     {'DOWN', _, process, Forwarder, 4} = receive_any(),
 2952:     ok.
 2953: 
 2954: send2_do2(SendBlobF, To) ->   
 2955:     MsgEnv = alloc_msgenv(),
 2956:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2957:     {ok,1,Blob0} = SendBlobF(MsgEnv, To),
 2958:     Blob1 = receive_any(),
 2959:     Blob1 = Blob0,
 2960:     
 2961:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2962:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2963:     {ok,1,Blob2} = SendBlobF(MsgEnv, To),
 2964:     Blob3 = receive_any(),
 2965:     Blob3 = Blob2,
 2966: 
 2967:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2968:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2969: 
 2970:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2971:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2972:     {ok,1,Blob4} = SendBlobF(MsgEnv, To),
 2973:     Blob5 = receive_any(),
 2974:     Blob5 = Blob4,
 2975: 
 2976:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2977:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2978:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2979:     {ok,1,Blob6} = SendBlobF(MsgEnv, To),
 2980:     Blob7 = receive_any(),
 2981:     Blob7 = Blob6,
 2982: 
 2983:     ok.
 2984: 
 2985: 
 2986: send_blob_thread_and_join(MsgEnv, To) ->
 2987:     {ok,Blob} = send_blob_thread_dbg(MsgEnv, To, no_join),
 2988:     {ok,SendRes} = join_send_thread(MsgEnv),
 2989:     {ok,SendRes,Blob}.
 2990: 
 2991: send_blob_dbg(MsgEnv, To) ->
 2992:     Ret = send_blob(MsgEnv, To),
 2993:     %%io:format("send_blob to ~p returned ~p\n",[To,Ret]),
 2994:     Ret.
 2995: 
 2996: send_blob_thread_dbg(MsgEnv, To, Join) ->
 2997:     Ret = send_blob_thread(MsgEnv, To, Join),
 2998:     %%io:format("send_blob_thread to ~p Join=~p returned ~p\n",[To,Join,Ret]),
 2999:     Ret.
 3000: 
 3001: 
 3002: forwarder(To) ->
 3003:     forwarder(To, 0).
 3004: forwarder(To, N) ->
 3005:     case receive_any() of
 3006: 	terminate ->
 3007:             gc_and_exit(N);
 3008: 	Msg ->	    
 3009: 	    To ! Msg,	   
 3010: 	    forwarder(To, N+1)
 3011:     end.
 3012: 
 3013: other_term() ->
 3014:     {fun(X,Y) -> X*Y end, make_ref()}.
 3015: 
 3016: %% Message sending stress test
 3017: send3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3018:     %% Let a number of processes send random message blobs between each other
 3019:     %% using enif_send. Kill and spawn new ones randomly to keep a ~constant
 3020:     %% number of workers running.
 3021:     rand:seed(exsplus),
 3022:     io:format("seed: ~p\n",[rand:export_seed()]),
 3023:     ets:new(nif_SUITE,[named_table,public]),
 3024:     true = ets:insert(nif_SUITE,{send3,0,0,0,0}),
 3025:     timer:send_after(10000, timeout), % Run for 10 seconds
 3026:     SpawnCnt = send3_controller(0, [], [], 20),
 3027:     [{_,Rcv,SndOk,SndFail,Balance}] = ets:lookup(nif_SUITE,send3),
 3028:     io:format("spawns=~p received=~p, sent=~p send-failure=~p balance=~p\n",
 3029:               [SpawnCnt,Rcv,SndOk,SndFail,Balance]),
 3030:     ets:delete(nif_SUITE).
 3031: 
 3032: send3_controller(SpawnCnt, [], _, infinity) ->
 3033:     SpawnCnt;
 3034: send3_controller(SpawnCnt0, Mons0, Pids0, Tick) ->
 3035:     receive 
 3036:         timeout ->
 3037:             io:format("Timeout. Sending 'halt' to ~p\n",[Pids0]),            
 3038:             lists:foreach(fun(P) -> P ! {halt,self()} end, Pids0),
 3039:             lists:foreach(fun(P) -> receive {halted,P} -> ok end end, Pids0),
 3040:             QTot = lists:foldl(fun(P,QSum) ->
 3041:                                  {message_queue_len,QLen} = 
 3042:                                     erlang:process_info(P,message_queue_len),
 3043:                                  QSum + QLen
 3044:                                end, 0, Pids0),
 3045:             io:format("Total queue length ~p\n",[QTot]),            
 3046:             lists:foreach(fun(P) -> P ! die end, Pids0),
 3047:             send3_controller(SpawnCnt0, Mons0, [], infinity);
 3048:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, _Pid, _} ->
 3049:             Mons1 = lists:delete(MonRef, Mons0),
 3050:             %%io:format("Got DOWN from ~p. Monitors left: ~p\n",[Pid,Mons1]),            
 3051:             send3_controller(SpawnCnt0, Mons1, Pids0, Tick)
 3052:     after Tick -> 
 3053:         Max = 20,
 3054:         N = length(Pids0),
 3055:         PidN = rand:uniform(Max),
 3056:         %%io:format("N=~p PidN=~p Pids0=~p\n", [N,PidN,Pids0]), 
 3057:         case PidN > N of
 3058:             true ->
 3059:                 {NewPid,Mon} = spawn_opt(fun send3_proc/0, [link,monitor]),                
 3060:                 lists:foreach(fun(P) -> P ! {is_born,NewPid} end, Pids0),
 3061:                 Balance = ets:lookup_element(nif_SUITE,send3,5),
 3062:                 Inject = (Balance =< 0),
 3063:                 case Inject of
 3064:                     true ->  ok;
 3065:                     false -> ets:update_element(nif_SUITE,send3,{5,-1})
 3066:                 end,
 3067:                 NewPid ! {pids,Pids0,Inject},
 3068:                 send3_controller(SpawnCnt0+1, [Mon|Mons0], [NewPid|Pids0], Tick);
 3069:             false ->
 3070:                 KillPid = lists:nth(PidN,Pids0),
 3071:                 KillPid ! die,
 3072:                 Pids1 = lists:delete(KillPid, Pids0),
 3073:                 lists:foreach(fun(P) -> P ! {is_dead,KillPid} end, Pids1),
 3074:                 send3_controller(SpawnCnt0, Mons0, Pids1, Tick)
 3075:         end        
 3076:    end.
 3077: 
 3078: send3_proc() ->
 3079:     %%io:format("Process ~p spawned\n",[self()]),
 3080:     send3_proc([self()], {0,0,0}, {1,2,3,4,5}).
 3081: send3_proc(Pids0, Counters={Rcv,SndOk,SndFail}, State0) ->
 3082:     %%io:format("~p: Pids0=~p", [self(), Pids0]),
 3083:     %%timer:sleep(10),
 3084:     receive 
 3085:         {pids, Pids1, Inject} ->
 3086:             %%io:format("~p: got ~p Inject=~p\n", [self(), Pids1, Inject]), 
 3087:             Pids0 = [self()],
 3088:             Pids2 = [self() | Pids1],
 3089:             case Inject of
 3090:                 true -> send3_proc_send(Pids2, Counters, State0);
 3091:                 false -> send3_proc(Pids2, Counters, State0)
 3092:             end;
 3093:         {is_born, Pid} ->
 3094:             %%io:format("~p: is_born ~p, got ~p\n", [self(), Pid, Pids0]), 
 3095:             send3_proc([Pid | Pids0], Counters, State0);
 3096:         {is_dead, Pid} ->            
 3097:             Pids1 = lists:delete(Pid,Pids0),
 3098:             %%io:format("~p: is_dead ~p, got ~p\n", [self(), Pid, Pids1]),
 3099:             send3_proc(Pids1, Counters, State0);
 3100:         {blob, Blob0} ->
 3101:             %%io:format("~p: blob ~p\n", [self(), Blob0]),
 3102:             State1 = send3_new_state(State0, Blob0),
 3103:             send3_proc_send(Pids0, {Rcv+1,SndOk,SndFail}, State1);
 3104:         die ->
 3105:             %%io:format("Process ~p terminating, stats = ~p\n",[self(),Counters]),
 3106:             {message_queue_len,Dropped} = erlang:process_info(self(),message_queue_len),
 3107:             _R = ets:update_counter(nif_SUITE,send3,
 3108:                                [{2,Rcv},{3,SndOk},{4,SndFail},{5,1-Dropped}]),
 3109:             %%io:format("~p: dies R=~p\n", [self(), R]),
 3110:             ok;
 3111:         {halt,Papa} ->
 3112:             Papa ! {halted,self()},
 3113:             io:format("~p halted\n",[self()]),
 3114:             receive die -> ok end,
 3115:             io:format("~p dying\n",[self()])
 3116:     end.
 3117: 
 3118: send3_proc_send(Pids, {Rcv,SndOk,SndFail}, State0) ->
 3119:     To = lists:nth(rand:uniform(length(Pids)),Pids),
 3120:     Blob = send3_make_blob(),
 3121:     State1 = send3_new_state(State0,Blob), 
 3122:     case send3_send(To, Blob) of
 3123:         true ->
 3124:             send3_proc(Pids, {Rcv,SndOk+1,SndFail}, State1);
 3125:         false ->
 3126:             send3_proc(Pids, {Rcv,SndOk,SndFail+1}, State1)
 3127:     end.
 3128: 
 3129: 
 3130: send3_make_blob() ->    
 3131:     case rand:uniform(20)-1 of
 3132:         0 -> {term,[]};
 3133:         N ->
 3134:             MsgEnv = alloc_msgenv(), 
 3135:             repeat(N bsr 1,
 3136:                    fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term(),rand:uniform(1 bsl 20))
 3137:                    end, void),
 3138:             case (N band 3) of
 3139:                 0 -> {term,copy_blob(MsgEnv)};
 3140:                 1 -> {copy,copy_blob(MsgEnv)};
 3141:                 _ -> {msgenv,MsgEnv}
 3142:             end
 3143:     end.
 3144: 
 3145: send3_send(Pid, Msg) ->
 3146:     %% 90% enif_send and 10% normal bang
 3147:     case rand:uniform(10) of
 3148:         1 -> send3_send_bang(Pid,Msg);
 3149:         _ -> send3_send_nif(Pid,Msg)
 3150:     end.
 3151: send3_send_nif(Pid, {term,Blob}) ->
 3152:     %%io:format("~p send term nif\n",[self()]),
 3153:     send_term(Pid, {blob, Blob}) =:= 1;
 3154: send3_send_nif(Pid, {copy,Blob}) ->
 3155:     %%io:format("~p send term nif\n",[self()]),
 3156:     send_copy_term(Pid, {blob, Blob}) =:= 1;
 3157: send3_send_nif(Pid, {msgenv,MsgEnv}) ->
 3158:     %%io:format("~p send blob nif\n",[self()]),   
 3159:     send3_blob(MsgEnv, Pid, blob) =:= 1.
 3160: 
 3161: send3_send_bang(Pid, {term,Blob}) ->
 3162:     %%io:format("~p send term bang\n",[self()]),   
 3163:     Pid ! {blob, Blob},
 3164:     true;
 3165: send3_send_bang(Pid, {copy,Blob}) ->
 3166:     %%io:format("~p send term bang\n",[self()]),
 3167:     Pid ! {blob, Blob},
 3168:     true;
 3169: send3_send_bang(Pid, {msgenv,MsgEnv}) ->
 3170:     %%io:format("~p send blob bang\n",[self()]),   
 3171:     Pid ! {blob, copy_blob(MsgEnv)},
 3172:     true.
 3173: 
 3174: send3_new_state(State, Blob) ->
 3175:     case rand:uniform(5+2) of
 3176:         N when N =< 5-> setelement(N, State, Blob);
 3177:         _ -> State  % Don't store blob
 3178:     end.
 3179: 
 3180: %% Negative testing of load_nif
 3181: neg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3182:     TmpMem = tmpmem(),
 3183:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:load_nif(badarg, 0)),
 3184:     
 3185:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 3186:     File = filename:join(Data, "nif_mod"),
 3187:     {ok,nif_mod,Bin} = compile:file(File, [binary,return_errors]),
 3188:     {module,nif_mod} = erlang:load_module(nif_mod,Bin),
 3189: 
 3190:     {error,{load_failed,"Failed to load NIF library"++_}} = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 0),
 3191:     {error,{bad_lib,"Failed to find library init"++_}} = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 3),
 3192:     {error,{bad_lib,"Function not found"++_}} = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 4),
 3193:     {error,{bad_lib,"Duplicate NIF entry for"++_}} = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 5),
 3194:     verify_tmpmem(TmpMem),
 3195:     ok.
 3196: 
 3197: %% Test all enif_is functions
 3198: is_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

 3200:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 3201: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 3202: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, 12),
 3203:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 3204: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 3205: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, -12),
